title: Android App Development
text: Android is an open-source software stack for mobile devices, which includes an operating system, middleware, and key applications. Android's mobile operating system is based upon a modified version of the Linux kernel.

section.title: Benefits
section.content: Understand the technicalities and gain practical knowledge of how to create a mobile app

section.title: Benefits
section.content: Learn penetration on different devices, since Android is used almost everywhere by various companies

section.title: Benefits
section.content: Certificate of Participation for each participant from Techkriti, IIT Kanpur
